title: Schedule an Appointment
itunes:title: Schedule an Appointment
description:
Thursday 5/11- Today on the show during the Rumor Report, Angela reported the email Steve Harvey sent to his staff where he makes it clear that if they want to speak with him they need to make an appointment; so we opened up the phone lines to hear what are listeners thought of it. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to the President of Bethune- Cookman University and Angela helped listeners out with Ask Yee.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
